@template public
{{html:
<style type="text/css">

.subscript {font-size: 20px;}
.fontSmaller { font-size: 14px !important;}
</style>

{{div: class=white}}
{{div2: class=container | ng-app | ng-controller=PricingAllController}}

@col 12

h1. Pricing

{{html:

{{html:  
</ul>

<div class="tab-content">
  <div class="minCloud tab-pane fade in active" id="CloudSpace">
  <p>Each Mothership<sup>1</sup> Cloud Space provides you with a Virtual Private Datacenter:</p>
  <div class="col-md-12">
    <div class="col-md-6">
      <ul class="bulletStyle">
        <li>Each cloud space contains your pool of secured private resources</li>
        <li>Each cloud space is protected by a private Defense Shield Firewall</li>
        <li>Organize and distribute your cloud workloads over multiple Cloud Spaces</li>
      </ul>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-6">
      <ul class="bulletStyle">
        <li>Monitor and manage your usage-based consumption per Cloud Space</li>
        <li>Share a Cloud Space with verified users; Manage & Access multiple Cloud Spaces</li>
        <li>Each Cloud Space is hosted in a datacenter of choice</li>
      </ul>
    </div>
  </div>
    <br />
}}

{{div: class=row}}
    {{div2: class=col-md-4}}

{{html:

  </div>

  <div class="tab-pane fade in" id="MachineDeck">
  <p>The Mothership<sup>1</sup> Machine Deck includes a lot more features than many other cloud offerings. In addition to on-demand virtual machines, users also receive:</p>
  <div class="col-md-12">
    <div class="col-md-6">
      <ul class="bulletStyle">
        <li>Access to an advanced Cloud Space awhere users can manage their pool of secured private resources</li>
        <li>Private defense shields providing enterprise capable firewall and VPN</li>
        <li>Instant snapshots and immediate snapshot rollback capabilities</li>
      </ul>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-6">
      <ul class="bulletStyle">
        <li>Deployment of new virtual machines in seconds</li>
        <li>Disaster recovery backup included (managed by Mothership<sup>1</sup>)</li>
        <li>Secured integration with your local office IT through a secured tunnel: no public exposure of virtual machines on the internet!</li>
      </ul>
    </div>
  </div>
    <br />
  <div class="col-md-12 mB15">
        <div class="row operationWrap">
            <label class="col-sm-2 control-label">Operation System: </label>
            <div class="col-md-3">
                <select name="country" class="form-control" ng-model="os">
                    <option value="linux">Linux</option>
                    <option value="windows">Windows Standard</option>
                    <option value="windows_essentials">Windows Essentials</option>
                </select>
            </div>
            <div class="btn-group btn-group-sm priceHM floatR">
            <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" ng-model="pricingModel" btn-radio="'hr'">Hourly</button>
            <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" ng-model="pricingModel" btn-radio="'mo'">Monthly</button>
            </div>
        </div>
      </div>
  
}}
{{div: class=row}}
    {{div2: class=col-xs-12 col-md-2 | ng-repeat=plan in plans}}
        {{div3: class=panel panel-primary}}
            {{div4: class=cnrflash | ng-show=plan.recommended}}
                {{div5: class=cnrflash-inner}}
                    {{span: class=cnrflash-label}}
                        MOST @LF POPULAR
                    {{span}}
                {{div5}}
            {{div4}}
            {{div4: class=panel-heading}}
                {{html: <h3 class="headPrice"> {[plan.name]} </h3>}}
            {{div4}}
            {{div4: class=panel-body}}
                {{div5: class=the-price}}
                    {{html: <h1 ng-show="plan[os][pricingModel] == '-'">-</h1>}}
                    {{html:<h1 ng-show="plan[os][pricingModel] != '-'">${[plan[os][pricingModel]]}<span class=subscript ng-show="plan[os][pricingModel] != '-'">/{[pricingModel]}</span></h1>}}
                {{div5}}
                {{html:
                <table class="table">
                    <tr><td>{[plan.mem]} Memory</td></tr>
                    <tr><td>{[plan.cores]} 
                        <ng-pluralize count="plan.cores" when="{'one': 'Core', 'other': 'Cores'}">
                    </td></tr>
                    <tr><td>{[plan.primary]}GB SSD Storage<br>Scale to 100GB</td></tr>
                    <tr><td>Snapshots</td></tr>
                    <tr><td>Backup</td></tr>
                    <tr><td>Firewall & VPN</td></tr>
                </table>
                }}
            {{div4}}
            {{div4: class=panel-footer}}
                {{html:<a href="/$$space/SignUp" class="btn btn-success" role="button">Sign Up</a>}}
            {{div4}}
        {{div3}}
    {{div2}}
